text: *Segu may refer to **Ségou, a city in south-central Mali, the former capital of the Bamana Empire **Sergi López Segú, a Spanish footballer **Segu (novel), a novel by Maryse Condé **SEGU, the old ICAO airport code for José Joaquín de Olmedo International Airport, which serves Guayaquil in Ecuador
title: Segu
